EmailTemplate.subject: Event Reminder: IntApp Webinar Login Information...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
IntApp- Webinar Confirmation
Hi, Thanks for registering for the "Not @ILTA" Webinar Series. Today's topic is Master Data Management. It will start in half an hour, at 9am Pacific / 12pm Eastern (5pm BST) today. Video and audio access instructions are below:
Webinar Title: Master Data Management
Video:
Conference URL: https://www.livemeeting.com/cc/vcc/join?id=w3264759&role=attend&pw=A326475
Meeting ID: w3264759 Entry Code: A326475
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In
US/Canada: 800-946-0774 UK: 0-808-101-1147 Passcode: 3264759
Please log in and dial the conference audio line 5-10 minutes prior to the start time.
